name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-sharepoint-change-teams-notification
title: SharePoint item change triggers teams notification Prompt
shortDescription: This prompt helps with creating a notification on Teams when an item in SharePoint list is added, deleted or updated.
longDescription: This prompt helps with creating a notification on Teams when an item in SharePoint list is added, deleted or updated.

metadata.value: Create a flow that triggers a Teams notification to a specific channel or user when any item in a designated SharePoint list is created, updated, or deleted, including the details of the changes made.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of prompt in Power Automate for desktop Copilot
